content: Voice AI: Implement FastAPI /api/voice endpoints (webhook + outbound) with HMAC verify; save transcripts to leads; trigger marketing journey.
Frontend: Add "Have Mary Call Me" in chat (dialog to collect phone, calls outbound endpoint).
Wire server to include voice_router and restart; smoke test JSON handlers.
Request credentials: VAPI_PRIVATE_KEY, VAPI_WEBHOOK_SECRET, VAPI_PHONE_NUMBER_ID (and/or permission to provision), optional VAPI_ASSISTANT_ID.
